T02D1310:226b-0: @226b * // dpa' gcig ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
T02D1310:226b-2: # // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1310:226b-3: chos dbyings ye shes lhan cig skyes //
T02D1310:226b-4: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yon brkyang sdo //
T02D1310:226b-5: rgyan lnga thod phreng mgo skyes ser //
T02D1310:226b-6: gri gug thod phyag khyod la 'dud //
T02D1310:226b-7: blo dman bud med rnams kyi phyir //
T02D1310:226b-8: mdor bsdus rgyas pa ma yin pa //
T02D1310:226b-9: bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa yis //
T02D1310:226b-10: dpa' mo gcig pa bri bar bya //
T02D1310:226b-11: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1310:226b-12: dben pa'i gnas su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas la /
T02D1310:226b-13: ji skad gsungs pa'i rim pas bla ma mchod nas tshangs pa'i sgom pa byas la /
T02D1310:226b-14: de nas aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1310:226b-15: de rjes smon lam stobs las ni //
T02D1310:226b-16: chu skyes dmar po nyi dbus su //
T02D1310:226b-17: ma skyes mchog gi sa bon las //
T02D1310:226b-18: nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1310:226b-19: g-yas par gri gug 'jigs chen ma //
T02D1310:226b-20: g-yon pa na ni padma'i snod //
T02D1310:226b-21: g-yas pa min par kha tv'am ga / stag gi pags pas smad dkris pa //
T02D1310:226b-22: srog song steng na g-yon brkyang gnas //
T02D1310:226b-23: skra ser gyen 'greng phyag rgya lnga //
T02D1310:226b-24: thod phreng thal bas rnam brgyan la //
T02D1310:226b-25: de rjes ye shes sems dpa' gzhag / skye mched drug dang sku gsung thugs //
T02D1310:226b-26: dbang bskur bdud rtsi mchod par bya //
T02D1310:226b-27: aom a'a: aam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1310:226b-29: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
T02D1310:226b-31: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1310:226b-33: lha mo'i lte bar zla rgyas 'bar //
T02D1310:227a-2: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu //
T02D1310:227a-3: de nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste //
T02D1310:227a-4: de nyid mya ngan 'das pa yin //
T02D1310:227a-5: 'khor ba yongs su shes gyur na //
T02D1310:227a-6: mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod //
T02D1310:227a-7: ji ltar nor bu rin po che //
T02D1310:227a-8: ma phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur //
T02D1310:227a-9: rnam par phug pas sbyor ldan pa //
T02D1310:227a-10: 'khor ba'i rnam pa de lta bu //
T02D1310:227a-11: bla ma rnams kyis gsungs par 'gyur //
T02D1310:227a-12: dpa' gcig ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed pa dang rdzogs
T02D1310:227a-13: par ldan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon bsod snyoms
T02D1310:227a-14: pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1310:227a-16: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a aindra ru tsi dang /
